data.actual_result: Very briefly a Clyde icon appears with a blurple icon, instantly removing itself and switching back to the server initials.
data.expected_result: The icon will not change, besides highlighting colors changing.
data.short_description: Pressing an unselected guild without an icon will briefly flash from a Clyde icon into the initials of the server name.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a guild that has a long name and no avatar - Place the guild at the top of the list - Select another guild and close the discord app completely - Reopen the app - Select the server you sorted to the top with no icon
